title: Describe the picture
question: Describe the picture in detail. Include people, place, actions and feelings.
examples: The scene shows a busy street market with colorful stalls.
People are buying fresh fruit and chatting with vendors.
It seems lively and friendly, perhaps on a sunny weekend.

title: Express your opinion
question: Do you think technology makes life easier or more complicated? Explain your view.
examples: Technology simplifies tasks like navigation and communication.
However, constant notifications can be distracting and stressful.
Overall, it helps more than it hurts when used intentionally.

title: Speak about a past experience
question: Talk about a time when you learned something important outside school.
examples: I learned basic cooking during a summer job.
It taught me responsibility and planning meals for others.
Now I feel more independent and confident.
